  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static boolean
    getBool(String msg)
    Utility function to get a boolean value (true/false) and return it - Ask the user to enter 'yes' or 'no', reprompt otherwise - Return true if user enter 'yes', return false if user enter 'no' - The parameter 'msg' will be shown to the user during prompting
    static int
    getDiscount()
    Enter the percentage of discount
    static int
    getInt(String msg)
    Utility function to get a valid integer from the user and return it - Display error message if input is not an integer, prevent crashing - Automatically call sc.nextLine to prevent error in getting strings - The parameter 'msg' will be shown to the user during prompting
    static float
    getPositiveFloat(String msg)
    Utility function to get a valid positive float, used mainly in edit pricings - Display error message and prevent crashing if input is not a float, - Ensure float entered is not negative and not more than 2 decimal place - Automatically call sc.nextLine to prevent error in getting strings - The parameter 'msg' will be shown to the user during prompting
    static String
    getStr(String msg)
    Utility function to get a string and return it - Automatically trim blank spaces on left and right - Not allowing any comma to be entered, as comma can cause database parsing issues - The parameter 'msg' will be shown to the user during prompting
    static String
    getStrSafe(String msg)
    Utility function to assist safe string (trimmed)
    static void
    printBlue(String msg)
    Print message in blue color, mainly as a heading on various sections
    static void
    printCyan(String msg)
    Print message in cyan color
    static void
    printGoodbyeMessage()
    Display thank you message at the end when terminating the application
    static void
    printGreen(String msg)
    Print message in green color, mainly to display success messages
    static void
    printPurple(String msg)
    Print message in purple color, to display other important information
    static void
    printRed(String msg)
    Print message in red color, mainly to display error messages
    static void
    printWelcomeMessage()
    Display 'MOBLIMA' welcome message in the beginning of running the application
    static int
    promptInt(ArrayList<Integer> list, String str)
    Prompts user to enter valid integer contained in ArrayList of integer or -1 to quit

    • printWelcomeMessage

      public static void printWelcomeMessage()

    • printGoodbyeMessage

      public static void printGoodbyeMessage()
      Display thank you message at the end when terminating the application

    • getInt

      public static int getInt(String msg)
      Utility function to get a valid integer from the user and return it - Display error message if input is not an integer, prevent crashing - Automatically call sc.nextLine to prevent error in getting strings - The parameter 'msg' will be shown to the user during prompting
      Parameters:
      msg - The message that wants to be printed
      Returns:
      Valid integer that has been checked

    • getDiscount

      public static int getDiscount()
      Enter the percentage of discount
      Returns:
      Return valid discount amount

    • getPositiveFloat

      public static float getPositiveFloat(String msg)
      Utility function to get a valid positive float, used mainly in edit pricings - Display error message and prevent crashing if input is not a float, - Ensure float entered is not negative and not more than 2 decimal place - Automatically call sc.nextLine to prevent error in getting strings - The parameter 'msg' will be shown to the user during prompting
      Parameters:
      msg - The message that wants to be printed
      Returns:
      Valid float that has been checked

    • getStr

      public static String getStr(String msg)
      Utility function to get a string and return it - Automatically trim blank spaces on left and right - Not allowing any comma to be entered, as comma can cause database parsing issues - The parameter 'msg' will be shown to the user during prompting
      Parameters:
      msg - The message that wants to be printed
      Returns:
      Valid String that has been checked

    • getStrSafe

      public static String getStrSafe(String msg)
      Utility function to assist safe string (trimmed)
      Parameters:
      msg - The message that wants to be printed
      Returns:
      String input that is already trimmed

    • getBool

      public static boolean getBool(String msg)
      Utility function to get a boolean value (true/false) and return it - Ask the user to enter 'yes' or 'no', reprompt otherwise - Return true if user enter 'yes', return false if user enter 'no' - The parameter 'msg' will be shown to the user during prompting
      Parameters:
      msg - The message that wants to be printed
      Returns:
      Boolean that has been translated from yes to true and no to false

    • printRed

      public static void printRed(String msg)
      Print message in red color, mainly to display error messages

      public static int promptInt(ArrayList<Integer> list, String str)
